Forms.Html: Thank you for completing this Campus University form. We will contact you shortly if there is anything else that we need from you. If you need to reach us, please call: 1-888-CAMPUS1.

Forms.Name: FERPA Release Form
Forms.Html:
FERPA RELEASE FORM

The Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act of 1974, also known as FERPA and/or The Buckley Amendment of 1974, as amended, grants students and eligible parents certain rights and privacies regarding education records of students attending postsecondary institutions. By submitting this form, the student may consent to release his/her educational records and/or other information to a third-party for a defined purpose. A new form must be submitted for each request.
Student Information:
Directory Information to Release:
  • Student Name
  • Address
  • Telephone Number
  • E-mail Address
  • Photograph
  • Date of Birth
  • Place of Birth
  • Campus
  • Major Field of Study
  • Dates of Attendance
  • Grade Level
  • Enrollment Status
  • Participation in Activities
  • Degrees
  • Honors and Awards
  • Recent Institution Attended
Education Information to Release:

I authorize Campus University to release the following types of Education Information. **At least one item must be selected to share.
Person Authorized:

This information may be released to the person listed below.
